In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K F : (AbsRing_NormedModule K -> Prop) -> Prop FF : Filter F x : V x' : AbsRing_NormedModule K Hlimx' : is_filter_lim F x' Unable to unify "is_filter_lim F x'" with "is_domin F (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule K => minus y x') (fun y : AbsRing_NormedModule K => minus (minus (scal y x) (scal x' x)) (scal (minus y x') x))".

original: intros K V F FF x. intros P Q HP HQ. intros Hlinear Hfilterlim. split. - apply Hlinear. - intros x' Hlimx'. apply Hlinear. apply Hfilterlim. apply Hlimx'.
